mapper.update: update qu_rule set visibility = #{visibility} where id = #{id}

select.if: select ru.id,ru.name,ru.code,ru.belong_role as roleId,ro.name as roleName,ru.visibility,ru.num, ru.creator,emp.name as creatorName, date_format(ru.creatorTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as creatorTime from qu_rule ru left join sys_emp emp on emp.id = ru.creator left join sys_role ro on ro.id = ru.belong_role

select ru.id,ru.name,ru.code,ru.belong_role as roleId,ro.name as roleName,ru.visibility,ru.num, ru.creator,emp.name as creatorName, CONVERT(varchar, ru.creatorTime, 120 ) as creatorTime from qu_rule ru left join sys_emp emp on emp.id = ru.creator left join sys_role ro on ro.id = ru.belong_role
